accessStatistics.description-detail: Opens the app\'s statistics section to view summarized sleep data and averages.

startSleep.description-detail: Starts a new sleep session by initiating the app\'s sleep tracking after a brief delay.

updateReportDuration.description-detail: Sets the sleep report duration filter to display data from the last month in the app\'s settings.

deleteAllSleeps.description-detail: Deletes all recorded sleep entries after user confirmation, effectively clearing the entire sleep history.
